title: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When trying to add Javadoc on a field in the TH, the expected behavior is that the Javadoc is successfully added to the field.
EB: Currently, when selecting "Add Javadoc" from the context menu, nothing happens. This is not the expected behavior. The action should add the Javadoc to the field.
SR: To resolve this issue, either remove the "Add Javadoc" option from the context menu or fix the functionality so that it successfully adds Javadoc to the field when selected.
